title: BREAKING: $56 Airfare War on 3 Airlines!
text:
Home > Flight Deals > BREAKING: $56 Airfare War on 3 Airlines! BREAKING: $56 Airfare War on 3 Airlines! July 22, 2015 8:24pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
On sale now through midnight tonight, American, Southwest, and United all have reduced fares for travel through December. In more detail, the sales' travel restrictions state that the lowest fares are valid any day during August 25-December 16 save for Fridays, Sundays, September 3, 4, 7; November 24, 25, 28-30. Again, tickets must be booked by 11:59 p.m. tonight, July 30.

On sale now through midnight tonight, American, Southwest, and United all have reduced fares for travel through December. In more detail, the sales' travel restrictions state that the lowest fares are valid any day during August 25-December 16 save for Fridays, Sundays, September 3, 4, 7; November 24, 25, 28-30. Again, tickets must be booked by 11:59 p.m. tonight, July 30. 
Fares start at $55.50 one-way (rounded up to $56 one-way in this deal report's headline, and displayed round-trip in our sample fares below). EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: The best prices were found for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find these promotions on American 's, Southwest 's, United 's sale pages. Pros: Availability includes travel most days of the week. Cons:
